comments:
Description:
   Set an alias on a column of the join dataset, an error is thrown out

Steps to reproduce:
   1. new a report
   2. new two dataset and create a join dataset on the two datasets
   3. set an alias on a column on the dataset
   4. drag the joint dataset to the layout, add a filter row["a"]>10 on the table
   5. save and preview.

Actual result:
